title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 December 2013 - XWiki
content:

07:39 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:44 <vmassol> has quit  
08:25 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:03 <ccatY> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <ccatY> Does anyone know hot to implement an "approved revision" funktion in xwiki? Like in MediaWiki: http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Approved\_Revs  
09:21 <vmassol> ccatY: maybe http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/XWiki+Publication+Workflow+Application  
09:27 <ccatY> Thx for your reply. This is the best match we found, too - but it is much more complicated than an approved revision process. Could this be solved with an custom component? I have no idea how to manipulate the rendered revision on viewing the page.  
09:30 <ccatY> Something like a "hook" an view mode.  
09:30 <ccatY> "hook on view mode" (sorry)  
09:40 <vmassol> ccatY: yes you can do that easily by scripting it. I don't guarantee performances though  
09:45 <vmassol> hold on  
09:46 <ccatY> i do :-)  
09:51 <vmassol> ccatY: for example: http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMA?viewer=code  
09:52 <ccatY> thx, I'll have a look, mom  
09:54 <vmassol> another example with the current doc: http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMA2?viewer=code  
09:54 <vmassol> there's a better way of course in order to not change the doc's content  
09:54 <vmassol> hold on  
09:55 <ccatY> i do again (thx in advance)  
09:58 <vmassol> here you go: http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMA2  
09:58 <vmassol> if you check this page content, it's:  http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMA2?viewer=code  
09:58 <vmassol> but it displays "original content"  
09:58 <vmassol> :)  
09:59 <vmassol> this is thanks to an xobject it has attached of type VMAClass that I have created at http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMAClass  
09:59 <vmassol> and then I have a sheet at http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMASheet  
09:59 <vmassol> and a classsheetbinding in VMAClass  
09:59 <vmassol> sorry I have to go and not much time to explain, how you can google and find some explanations  
10:00 <ccatY> Thx very much! Hope to see you later! Bye  
11:32 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
11:57 <crocket> has joined #xwiki  
11:57 <crocket> I just deleted a whole space.  
11:58 <crocket> man  
11:58 <crocket> now it requires programming rights to view deleted documents.  
12:03 <crocket> hmm  
12:03 <crocket> Lots of macros are suddenly unknown.  
12:08 <crocket> The "documents" macro is not in the list of registered macros. Verify the spelling or contact your administrator.  
13:05 <vmassol> ccatY: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/How+to+implement+%22Approved+Revisions%22

23:32 <Jigar54> has joined #xwiki  
23:34 <Jigar54> i m a student of IIIT Hyderabad and want to start contributing for xwiki...can anyone guide me through ?  
23:37 <vmassol> Jigar54: great, see http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Contributing  
23:51 <Jigar54> read the document for contribution part...how can i start contributing??  
23:51 <vmassol> Jigar54: what are you looking for? What's missing from the doc?  
23:52 <Jigar54> i mean how do i download it that is find issues in what ??  
23:53 <vmassol> Jigar54: not sure I understand. All the issues are on http://jira.xwiki.org  
23:53 <Jigar54> okay got it sry
